title: How do you get Mastery 7?
body: How do you get Mastery 7 on any champion?

replies.body: It'll take a bit of work!  You'll need to hop into SR and grab tokens by earning an S or higher.  More details are also available through our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide).  Let me know if you have any questions!
